::Zardus/WarMachine::

Zardus looks over all the bots that were asking for orders, glancing 
at the departing pieces of the Alliance base.

"Please do," he replies to Unitron, turning to the rest.

"Let's get to the new base. We nee-"

He stops talking as he hears a voice to the side of him, turning his 
head in time to see Lady Hawk swing a needle at Squizzy.

"Kill her," Zardus growls, firing his gun at Lady Hawk, "Don't hit 
Squizzy though."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WarMachine splits into his five robots, hearing Zardus' command. 
Havoc and Repressor land on the ground, opening fire on Lady Hawk.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The shuttles carrying the Alliance base reach the ocean, flying 
ahead. They would soon reach the island the Iron Fist was at.

At the Iron Fist, work drones (no guns or anything) were clearing an 
area of the island for the Alliance base. The island was a half-
circle, with the Iron Fist floating in the indent. It was about three 
miles away from the mainland. Metal plates covered the sides of the 
island, running down toward the ocean floor.

Island map (just a general idea of what it looks like. NOT exact, 
just general):

    _____________
   /             \
  /   Old Base    \
  |    _______    |
  |   /  IF   \   |
  \__/         \__/

from her
> side. She swings hard at Squizzy planning on removing the threat 
she was.
> Lady Hawk planned on stunning the bot then destroying it.
